name: 3D Castle Environment by Carlos Maldonado
description:
3D Castle environment for video games.

Programming and Art by Carlos Maldonado

*Floor and brick textures from 3Dtextures.me

Contact: cmaldonadoangeles@icloud.com

In-game controls: 

Mouse for camera movement

WASD/Arrow keys for movement

Left click to attack

Space to run

Shift to guard
